net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api

Interface NlsMessageFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNlsMessageFactory, AbstractNlsMessageFactoryImpl, NlsMessageFactoryImpl

    @ComponentSpecification
public interface NlsMessageFactory
    This is the interface for a factory used to create instances of NlsMessage.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @Deprecated
NlsMessage create(String internationalizedMessage,
                               Object... messageArguments)
        Deprecated. use create(String, Map) instead.
        This method creates a new instance of NlsMessage from the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        internationalizedMessage - is the internationalized message.
        messageArguments - are the arguments filled into the message after nationalization.
        Returns:
        the new NlsMessage instance.

      • create

        @Deprecated
NlsMessage create(NlsTemplate template,
                               Object... messageArguments)
        Deprecated. use create(NlsTemplate, Map) instead.
        This method creates a new instance of NlsMessage from the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        template - is the NlsTemplate for the raw message.
        messageArguments - are the arguments filled into the message after nationalization.
        Returns:
        the new NlsMessage instance.

        internationalizedMessage - is the internationalized message.
        key1 - is the key of the first argument.
        argument1 - is the value of the first argument.

      • create

        NlsMessage create(String internationalizedMessage,
                  Map<String,Object> messageArguments)
        This method creates a new instance of NlsMessage from the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        internationalizedMessage - is the internationalized message.
        messageArguments - are the arguments filled into the message after nationalization.
        Returns:
        the new NlsMessage instance.

      • createDirect

        NlsMessage createDirect(String bundleName,
                        String key)
        This method creates a new instance of NlsMessage from the given arguments.
        ATTENTION:
        This us an uncommon way for creating an NlsMessage. It should only be used for specific cases where both NlsBundle and AbstractResourceBundle are NOT suitable. Please read net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api as motivation and introduction.
        Parameters:
        bundleName - is the base-name of the bundle containing the message.
        key - is the key for the lookup. Will be used as fallback for the internationalized message.
        Returns:
        the new NlsMessage instance.
        Since:
        3.1.0
        See Also:
        createDirect(String, String, Map)

      • createDirect

        NlsMessage createDirect(String bundleName,
                        String key,
                        Map<String,Object> messageArguments)
        This method creates a new instance of NlsMessage from the given arguments.
        ATTENTION:
        This us an uncommon way for creating an NlsMessage. It should only be used for specific cases where both NlsBundle and AbstractResourceBundle are NOT suitable. Please read net.sf.mmm.util.nls.api as motivation and introduction.
        Parameters:
        bundleName - is the base-name of the bundle containing the message.
        key - is the key for the lookup. Will be used as fallback for the internationalized message.
        messageArguments - are the arguments filled into the message after nationalization.
        Returns:
        the new NlsMessage instance.
        Since:
        3.1.0

      • create

        NlsMessage create(NlsTemplate template,
                  Map<String,Object> messageArguments)
        This method creates a new instance of NlsMessage from the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        template - is the NlsTemplate for the raw message.
        messageArguments - are the arguments filled into the message after nationalization.
        Returns:
        the new NlsMessage instance.
